msbt.message: Zzznyam, nyam, nyam
Mrrpharrr! Don't wanna get up, Ma. Lemme sail the seven Zs Zzz
Arrr! I don't care if it's me turn to man the helm. Me nap time is me nap time Zzz
ARRR! Storm's a-comin'! Brace yerselves, mateys! ZzzHatten down the batches! Or is it batten down the hatches? Zzz
Zzz Ye call that a sea bass? I give it a C- at bestarrr! Nyam, nyam
S-such a storm This is it, mateys! We're headed for Davy Jones's shoe cubby! Zzz
Arrr Buccaneer? That's a bit out of me price range. Could I talk ye into a discount for both ears? Zzz
Yo-ho, yo-ho Pirate sounds, et cetera
Zzz Raise the main sail! Ready the yard sale! Anyone seen the mizzen mast? Arrr, zzz
SNRRK, snrrk Arr! If I find even a single raisin in these cookies I'll keelhaul the lot of ye! Zzz

Arrr! This buffet may be the end of me, lads, but I think I can tamp a bit more peach cobbler down me gulletAVAST! Where'd the buffet go? What trickery is this?! Do ye even know who ye be messin' with?I be Captain Gullivarrr, legendary pirate, feared for all manner of dreadful gullduggery! Arrr!

Now, where's the cruel matey who burst me buffet bubble? Was it YE?Arrr, ye don't LOOK very cruel I s'ppose ye did me a favor. I might have gobbled up this whole beach!Aye, ye saved me stomach linin' from a sandy demise. Beggin' yer pardon for me sleepy confusion, arrr.Oof, but I do have a powerful ache in me noggin

I was partakin' of a bit o' the GOOD soda with me crew, but I tumbled o'er the prow and into the sea!'Tis naught but a mild inconvenience, though, for we be livin' in an age of gadgety miracles!I've got me a treasure that can summon a ship—day or night, sea or shore! HAR!
ARRR! Put your backs into it, me hearties! Haul as much as ye can carry! We ship out in— Oh. Oops!This be no grocery run! This is the isle of me bestest matey! How've ye been, ?

As for me, well, I took another tumble over the bow into the sea, washed up here Ye know how it be.Arrr! Guess ye could say I'mall washed up! A wash-up, I tells ye!It be mighty unkind to not give yer favorite captain a courtesy laughWell, I'll forgive ye. The rescuin' bit will be no laughin' matter after all.

Arrr! Have at ye, Cortez! Three swords AND a hook? Let's make this a fair duelI'll tie one wing behind me back! HAR! I— Huh?Blimey! What a dream. I was in the midst of a fierce pirate battle with one of me greatest rivals, arrr!Say! If it isn't ! Good to see ye again, skipper.

Sorry I came out swingin'! Didn't mean to give ye a scare.Matter o' fact, it was a few practice swings of me fearful fisticuffery that sent me tumblin' overboard!Now I gotta message me buccaneer buddies for another rescue

GAH! Wh-what happened?! Where am I? Who are you? Why am I dressed like this?!Wait! It's all coming back to me Ye be ! Of course!Arrr! I think me cage was rattled pretty bad that time. I'm feelin' a wee bit birdbrainedDo ye get it? 'Cause I be a bird! HAR HAR! Arrr, I quack me up.
Kiddin' aside, I, uh, fell overboard again. Ye probably guessed as much. I'll contact me crew straightaway

Ah— Ahhh— <10_10 />ACHOOOOO!<10_9 />Blimey! I be freezin' me webbed tootsies off. How long was I soakin' up seawater this time?Arrr! Just look at the state I'm in. The tips of me wings are as wrinkled and limp as soggy sargassum. Blech!

Shiver me timbers! If it ain't me matey ! Again!Say, what is it about this island?Folks be fearin' me buccaneerin' from Crocodile Isle to Keelhaul Key but the waves always lead me here!Arrr, it's probably just a coincidence. I should call me crew for a pickup
So long as I've got me trusty ol' communicator, I'll be justuh.
<10_10 />OHMEGOSH!<10_9 />Me trusty communicator has gone and vanished! ARRR!Those waves bopped me around like an inflatable beach ball The thing must've slipped out of me pocket!

That meansI'm lost at sea! I'll have to wait for me buccaneer buddies to find me on their own!That could take quite a bit o' time I'm still workshoppin' me pirate puns, so those are shore to run out fast
AHOY! You, with the whale-sized noggin! Will ye help a stranded sea bird find his lost communicator?
Sure, I'll look for it.
No way!
I'm begging ye, matey! Will ye help find me communicator?!
Sure, I'll look for it.
No way!
Arrr! Ye means it?! Now there's a shanty deservin' of a jig!
Really?! Why, you're even sweeter than the famous Captain Syrup—but without her double-crossin', I hope!
Arrr Yer heart must be colder than a stranded space pirate without a spare pair o' socks.Don't be like that! It's just one wee favor. Do it for yer favorite pirate! Which had better be me. Arrr.
ARRR! I haven't felt this betrayed since I loaned me best jacket to that hornswaggler, LinebeckBut there's still time to prove yer loyalty. I've faith that you'll end up looking for it anyways, arrr!

Me gut says me communicator is in a nearby ocean!Me crew is surely searchin' for me, so I should keep lookout. Gots to be on land for that, ye savvy?That means it's up to ye to swim about and find me communicator. I'm countin' on ye, matey!Oh, and make sure there's room in your pockets before ye hunt, else you'll be blunderin' yer plunderin'!

If yer wonderin' where me ol' communicator may be, it's surely sunken offshore of this very island!Sunk like me piratin' career if I don't get it back, arrr!I'm countin' on ye, matey. You're me only hope!Oh, and free up yer pockets first! No sense huntin' me communicator if ye can't bring 'er aboard. HAR!
Arrr! Have ye found it yet?
Yarrr!
Narrr...

Me communicator surely sank to the bottom of a nearby seaIf that be the case, I'd best not flail me feathers out there.I'm known for many things across this wide and wild sea, but swimmin' isn't on the list. Ye savvy?
I'd bet me own sea biscuits that ol' communicator o' mine is sunk off this island's shores!This'll cast a shadow on me piratin' career for sure. Arrr, me reputation is about to take a dive
Oh, me poor ol' communicator Come back to me! Free yourself from Neptune's clammy grip!Arrr, me mournful wails earn no reply. It must be somewhere mighty deep with no hope of a signal
ARRR! That's it! That's me precious communicator!
I thank ye with all me heart, matey! With extra cherries on top, even! Now I can contact me faithful crew!
Ye saved me life! That's a debt that needs repayin', so I'll ship ye a fine reward soon—expedited! Arrr!
Ahhh, that takes a load off! Nothin' left to do but wander this here beach and look mean. Here I go! ARRR!

Avast, ye lily-livered sea dogs! 'Tis I, your beloved captain who makes things happ-tain!I had ANOTHER bad spill, so ye best change course and come pick me up. Here be me coordinates.Be quick about it, or I'll buckle your swashes for good! So says Captain Gullivarrr! ARRR! Winky face, send.Arrr. That oughta put some wind in their sails and no mistake.
The world's me oyster now that me communicator is back in me hands.
Me ol' crew must be sighin' in relief now that I've sent me message.
Arrr, that message o' mine has surely reached me buccaneer buddies by now.
Let's check the SMS Bounty No replies yet
It says me message was readso where are those scallywags?! They'll be swabbin' the deck for this delay!
It says they read me message, so I'm sure they're preparin' a grand pirate homecomin' for their captain!At leastthey'd BETTER be. ARRR!
Y'think me ship is on its way here? It says the crew got me messageI love me mateys, but they sure be slow to reply! HAR!
Hrmmmmph Nay I'm too comfy to be gettin' up, matey. Zzz
Arrr! I be a fearsome pirate captain who's sailed the seven seas!I'm sure we'll meet again someday, matey. The ocean's big, but it's not THAT big, ye savvy?

I be a rough, gruff pirate captain! I can silence a bawlin' babe with but a single bug-eyed glance!We're two ships passin' in the night for now, but it's just a matter of time before I turn up on YOUR isle. Arrr!
This be a quaint little island for a pirate such as I! Tell me, do ye have an isle of your own out there?Any treasure there, perhaps? Preferably unguarded and left out in the open? Arrr!
Arrr, I wonder where me pirate ship be right about now Is it even a pirate ship? Memory's a bit fuzzy.
See my unpatched pirate eye spyin' that horizon! 'Tis sea, sea, and MORE sea as far as ye can seey'see?
Ahoy! Are ye stranded on this isle too? I'm usin' this minivacation to work on me pirate snarl. ARRR! Good stuff, eh?
Arrr
Oh! If it isn't me local matey!I know I was supposed to be keepin' an eye out for me ship, butthe sound of the waves was so relaxin'HUH?! Ye actually found me lost communicator?!

Eh? What's that yer askin'? "Is that a wand outfit?" Yer suggestin' this pirate getup be a merecostume?'Fraid I don't catch your drift, bucko. Ye be speakin' a strange tongue. Don't you pay me no mind. Arrr!

Oh! New mateys! Don't go spreadin' rumors about me weak water wings in regards to swimmin', ye savvy?Besides that, ye should be showin' your crew a good time, not jawin' on with ol' Gullivarrr.After all, I'm definitely not goin' anywhere! HAR! Arrr
Ah, it's me matey from before! Thanks for the wake-up prod!
Arrr! Thanks for wakin' me up!
I be the famed pirate-captain extraordinaire, Gullivarrr!
A shockin' series of terrible mishaps ruffled me feathers AND me brain. Left me right tuckered out!

May I spin ye a yarn? I was thrown from me ship into the sea, then washed up hereI awoke to find me communicator— me most essential piratin' tool—had vanished! I'm at me wits' end!It's got to be sunk out in the sea. Ye look like a kind skipper Could yewould ye find it for me?!
Sure, I'll look for it.
No way!
I've had quite a bit going on. Looks as if I passed out right where I stood! Har. That's so me.

May I spin ye a yarn? I was thrown from me ship and into the sea, then washed up hereI awoke to find me communicator— me most essential piratin' tool—had vanished! All hope was surely lost.Arrr, but then a kindhearted matey turned up and found me missin' communicator in the blink of an eye!
So a happy ending after all. Why, me crew may have reached out while I told the tale! I'll just check meuh.
<10_10 />OHMEGOSH!<10_9 />Me trusty communicator is gone! AGAIN! ARRR!I must've dropped it when I passed out. The waves surely swept it out to sea again
Without it, I won't be able to get missives from me crew!It's got to be sunk out in the sea. Ye look like a kind skipper. Will ye find me communicator for me?!
Sure, I'll look for it.
No way!
I got hit by a dire need for some emergency shut-eyeI'm counting on ye! Keep searchin' for me lost communicator!
A kind ol' soul pulled me communicator out of the sea!
Knowin' it'd be smooth sailin' from there on, fatigue took the helm. Basically, I passed right out!
Arrr, I s'ppose I should reach out to me crewuh.

Without it, I won't be able to get missives from me crew!It's got to be sunk out in the sea. Ye look like a kind skipper. Will ye find me communicator for me?!The ship has sailed on sayin' no! Me fate is in yer hands! Arrr!
Avast! It's me matey from earlier!I seem to be cursed, stuck deep in a whole barrel of pickles! Leavin' this isle is way harder than it seems
Who can silence a bawlin' babe with a single bug-eyed glance? 'Tis I, a rough, tough pirate captain! Arrr!

One minute I'm on me pirate ship. The next, I'm tumblin' overboard and at the mercy of the cruel oceanAs if that weren't bad enough, me communicator also went missin'. Now I can't contact me crew!I'm pretty sure me ol' communicator sank straight to the ocean floor.
Without it, I'll have to wait for me crew to find me on their ownand they be useless without me!I'm beggin' ye, matey! Will ye help me find me communicator?!
I got tossed from me pirate ship into the sea, then washed up hereMe trusty communicator had gone missin'. All hope of rescue was lost! I was fortune's foolBUT THEN!
Avast! If it isn't me favorite matey!
OK, I should be gettin' a message from me crew any minute now.
As long as I have me trusty ol' communicator, thenuh.
<10_10 />OHMEGOSH!<10_9 />Me trusty communicator is goneAGAIN!
That slippery communicator must've slid back into the sea I'll never get back to me ship without it!I'm beggin' ye! Ye have to find me communicator for me!
